// 1
// if (A – B) > 3

000000_00000_00000_00000_00000_000000	// [0] sll $0, $0, 0
100011_00000_01001_0000000000000000		// [1] lw $t1 0($zero)
100011_00000_01010_0000000000000001		// [2] lw $t2 1($zero)
001000_00000_01011_0000000000000011 	// [3] addi $t3, $zero, 0x3
000000_01001_01010_01001_00000_100010 	// [4] sub $t1, $t1, $t2
000000_01011_01001_01010_00000_101010 	// [5] slt $t2, $t3, $t1
000101_01010_00000_0000000001000100 	// [6] bne $t2, $zero, DO ->adrx 68

// 3
//	C = C << 3;
//	*dPtr = 7;
//	G = E & F;

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000010 	// [7] lw $t1, 2($zero)
000000_00000_01001_01001_00101_000000 	// [8] sll $t1, $t1, 5
101011_00000_01001_0000000000000010 	// [9] sw $t1, 2($zero)

001000_00000_01100_0000000000000111 	// [10] addi $t4, $zero, 0x7
101011_00000_01100_0000000000000011 	// [11] sw $t4, 3($zero)

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000100		// [12] lw $t1, 4($zero)
100011_00000_01010_0000000000000101 	// [13] lw $t2, 5($zero)
000000_01001_01010_01011_00000_100100	// [14] and $t3, $t1, $t2
101011_00000_01011_0000000000000110 	// [15] sw $t3, 6($zero)

000010_00000000000000000001110000		// [16] j LAST -> adrx 112

// 2
//	C = C + 4;
//	D = C – 3;
//	G = E | F;

// [0x00000044]	DO:

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000010 	// [17] lw $t1, 2($zero)
001000_00000_01010_0000000000000100		// [18] addi $t2, $zero, 0x4
000000_01001_01010_01001_00000_100000 	// [19] add $t1, $t1, $t2
101011_00000_01001_0000000000000010 	// [20] sw $t1, 2($zero)

001000_00000_01010_0000000000000011 	// [21] addi $t2, $zero, 0x3
000000_01001_01010_01011_00000_100010 	// [22] sub $t3, $t1, $t2
101011_00000_01011_0000000000000011 	// [23] sw $t3, 3($zero)

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000100		// [24] lw $t1, 4($zero)
100011_00000_01010_0000000000000101		// [25] lw $t2, 5($zero)
000000_01001_01010_01011_00000_100101	// [26] or $t3, $t1, $t2
101011_00000_01011_0000000000000110 	// [27] sw $t3, 6($zero)

// 4
// A = A + B
// G = (E ^ F) & H

// [0x00000070]	LAST:

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000000		// [28] lw $t1, 0($zero)
100011_00000_01010_0000000000000001		// [29] lw $t2, 1($zero)
000000_01001_01010_01001_00000_100000	// [30] add $t1, $t1, $t2
101011_00000_01001_0000000000000000		// [31] sw $t1, 0($zero)

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000100		// [32] lw $t1, 4($zero)
100011_00000_01010_0000000000000101		// [33] lw $t2, 5($zero)
100011_00000_01011_0000000000000111		// [34] lw $t3, 7($zero)
000000_01001_01010_01001_00000_100110	// [35] xor $t1, $t1, $t2
000000_01001_01001_01011_00000_100100	// [36] and $t1, $t1, $t3
101011_00000_01001_0000000000000110		// [37] sw $t1, 6($zero)
